note:
My name is Yousef Zeyad, a Palestinian from Gaza and a Computer Engineering student set to graduate this year. The ongoing genocide has profoundly impacted my journey and shattered my hopes.

Despite this adversity, I remain hopeful and strive to share my story for a brighter future. I believe solidarity can make a difference.

I urgently need your support. If you can donate, I would be grateful. If not, please share my story. Your support can help restore hope in my life.
